feature_evidence.json: Lists feature reports mapping features to involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, theming variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing gallery state and rendering all page sections.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form with validation, submission state, and success message display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, attribution link, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Gallery grid with filter dropdown and hover effects showing provided gallery items.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, large AI monogram, title, and scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Renders a pricing section with three tiered plan cards, including features and styling for a highlighted plan.
Provides a text input and button to generate mock AI images, handling errors, loading state, and user submissions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with smooth-scrolling links and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/useMockGeneratio: Simulates AI image generation with a delay and returns a mock gallery item using random placeholder images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color tokens, themes, and utility classes including glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON project state describing the website plan, required images, features, and architectural notes for a static frontâ€‘end build.
